entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:20 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -38.0°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -42.4°C
Wind: WNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 44. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 61 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 61 in the morning and minus 51 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 55 in the evening and minus 61 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
